thread.section_title: Costa Rican Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Costa Rican Vacations | www.vacationscostarica.com
thread.title: Larry Hall
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Larry Hall

author: Larry Hall
title: Larry Hall
text:
Robin Sabine did an excellent job of planning, costing and coordinating our vacation before we even touched ground In Costa Rica! First class through and through. We traveled top Costa Rica (beautiful destination vacation) with our teenage sons. From being greeted in the airport to our private van to our destination(s) within Costa Rica, I cannot say enough. We also arranged various excursions with Robin and she was always available if we needed to adjust a time or date for an excursion.
I also recommended Robin to my sister in laws family (with two teenage daughters) and I know they were also very pleased with their trip and her services.
